rawIndexableTextContent: Inverse n-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform on a real input.  input array size of the transformed axis.  The corresponding axis in the input is truncated or padded with zeros to match n / 2 + 1.  If not specified array.dim(axis) / 2 + 1 will be used. axis along which to perform the FFT stream or device to evaluate on Return Value inverse of rfftn(_:s:axes:stream:) Discussion Note the input is generally complex. The dimensions of the input specified in axes are padded or truncated to match the sizes from s. The last axis in axes is treated as the real axis and will have size s[s.lastIndex] / 2 + 1. See Also MLXFFT
summary: Inverse n-dimensional discrete Fourier Transform on a real input.
title: irfftn(_:s:axes:stream:)

rawIndexableTextContent: One dimensional discrete Fourier Transform on a real input.  input array.  If the array is complex it will be silently cast to a real type size of the transformed axis.  The corresponding axis in the input is truncated or padded with zeros to match n.  If not specified array.dim(axis) will be used. axis along which to perform the FFT stream or device to evaluate on Return Value DFT of the input along the given axis.  The output data type will be complex. Discussion The output has the same shape as the input except along axis in which case it has size n / 2 + 1. See Also MLXFFT
summary: One dimensional discrete Fourier Transform on a real input.
title: rfft(_:n:axis:stream:)

rawIndexableTextContent: n-dimensional inverse discrete Fourier Transform.  input array sizes of the transformed axis.  The corresponding axes in the input are truncated or padded with zeros to match s.  If not specified array.dim(axes) will be used. axes along which to perform the FFT stream or device to evaluate on Return Value inverse DFT of the input along the given axes See Also MLXFFT
title: ifftn(_:s:axes:stream:)

rawIndexableTextContent: Two dimensional real discrete Fourier Transform.  input array sizes of the transformed axis.  The corresponding axes in the input are truncated or padded with zeros to match s.  If not specified array.dim(axes) will be used. axes along which to perform the FFT stream or device to evaluate on Return Value DFT of the input along the given axes.  The output data type will be complex. Discussion The output has the same shape as the input except along the dimensions in axes in which case it has sizes from s. The last axis in axes is treated as the real axis and will have size s[s.lastIndex] / 2 + 1. See Also MLXFFT
summary: Two dimensional real discrete Fourier Transform.
title: rfft2(_:s:axes:stream:)

If not specified array.dim(axis) / 2 + 1 will be used. axis along which to perform the FFT stream or device to evaluate on Return Value inverse of rfft(_:n:axis:stream:) Discussion The output has the same shape as the input except along axis in which case it has size n. See Also MLXFFT
